name: Tea Master Liu Su
desc: A storyteller for Heyu Tea House. He was originally Iron Tongue Tian's senior but had later agreed to work under Fan Er'ye for a wealthier audience.

customize.text: Adventure Challenge: Sojourn Through the Land of Stone

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
You had stopped at Wangshu Inn to get a reprieve from the pouring rain. But just then, you heard the sounds of whispered plots nearby. You looked closely, and ah -- who might it be but the spies of the Fatui...?
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Your Support Zone starts with 1 "Liu Su" card. When Action Phase begins, the active characters on both sides will be affected by Hydro.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Fatui Pyro Agent
customize.desc:
"Blade of Settlement" Agent

"There is no running from your debt, be you living or otherwise."

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Liu Su
customize.desc:
"In the Next Volume" Liu Su

"Well then, dear guests, what would you all like to hear next?"

value.name: Legend of the Shattered Halberd (III)
value.desc:
"Just stay with the name 'Weiyang' for convenience's sake on the road. With the official documents from the government in hand, you should be free to go as you wish throughout the kingdom." Still worried about Weiyang, Mir decided to accompany her on her journey and kill any demons they may encounter.
Though they had already collected five Ominous Swords and all seemed to be well, they knew in their hearts that the way forward would only get more treacherous and perilous.
